snippet: Stock indexes fell in a volatile session that sent investors rushing for the relative tranquillity of the bond market to wait for the outcome of the Federal Reserve’s policy meeting.
abstract: Stocks continue their decline on growing concern over oil prices and the impact it has had on Russian currency.
lead_paragraph: Stock indexes fell in a volatile session that sent investors rushing for the relative tranquillity of the bond market to wait for the outcome of the Federal Reserve’s policy meeting.

headline.main: Oil and the Ruble Drag the Market Down a Bumpy Slope
headline.print_headline: Oil and the Ruble Drag the Market Down a Bumpy Slope
